director.name: 詹姆斯·马内拉 Jim Manera

this_title: Soundbreaking: Stories from the Cutting Edge of Recorded Music
trans_title: 发声：来自唱片音乐前沿的故事
introduction: The eight-part series explores the art of music recording, and offers a behind-the-scenes look at the birth of brand new sounds. Featuring more than 160 original interviews with some of the most celebrated recording artists of all time, Soundbreaking explores the nexus of cutting-edge technology and human artistry that has created the soundtrack of our lives.
chinese_title: 发声：来自唱片音乐前沿的故事
foreign_title: Soundbreaking: Stories from the Cutting Edge of Recorded Music
